title: Samsung 28-Inch 4K Gaming Monitor Is Now $150 Off
text: Samsung Odyssey G70B Gaming Monitor Samsung is selling its super high-end G70B gaming monitor at a $150 discount. This limited-time deal features the 28-inch monitor, which supports 4K Ultra HD resolution and a fast 144 Hz refresh rate. The high-quality IPS panel has amazing colors and is compatible with high dynamic range content for a more vivid contrast in games and movies. Gamers looking for a 4K Ultra HD gaming monitor, check out the [Samsung Odyssey G70B monitor](https://www.amazon.com/SAMSUNG-FreeSync-Compatible-Ultrawide-LS28BG702ENXGO/dp/B0BGVYQ8CC?tag=gamerant0f-20&ascsubtag=UUgrUeUpU2163560&asc_refurl=https%3A%2F%2Fgamerant.com%2Fsamsung-28-inch-4k-gaming-monitor-is-now-150-off%2F&asc_campaign=Affiliate), which is now available at a solid $150 discount, bringing the price to a much more manageable $549.99. Thanks to the 21% price cut from the original listing price of $699.99, this monitor is among the better deals on high-end gaming monitors that offer both a 4K resolution and a fast refresh rate, perfect for fast-paced gaming. The monitor in question is part of Samsung's Odyssey lineup of gaming monitors. The Korean company has a long and storied history of producing [high-end panels for televisions](https://gamerant.com/samsung-s95c-oled-tv-review/) and monitors. The company's own production of display panels allows it to produce products that compete with the best in the field. This is also why the Odyssey series has some of the more advanced gaming monitors on the market, including ones with 4K Ultra HD resolution, like the Odyssey G70B. Why Samsung Odyssey G70B Is Superb for Gaming The Samsung Odyssey G70B brings together cutting-edge technology to offer amazing visuals and reliable gaming performance. With its [4K Ultra HD resolution](https://gamerant.com/best-4k-gaming-monitors/), the monitor brings absolute precision to graphics with four times as many pixels as a traditional gaming monitor. However, the monitor is not only about pixel density, since the IPS technology used in the panel also delivers great colors and contrast. This is evident in the fact that the monitor also supports HDR 400 standard for high dynamic range, producing more vibrant colors with deeper blacks and more detail. This makes it an excellent game for visually impressive games and other entertainment. In addition to solid color reproduction and sharp resolution, the monitor can also display images smoothly. The [monitor's 144 Hz refresh rate](https://gamerant.com/best-144hz-gaming-monitors/) and 1 ms response time are tailored for fast-paced gaming, reducing blurriness. In terms of other features, the monitor comes with a Gaming Hub, which gives instant access to a variety of cloud gaming services. The use of the Gaming Hub is free but charges may incur from other services. This unique feature makes it easy for gamers to switch from local gameplay to cloud services with hundreds of titles available without downloads. Gamers seeking an Ultra HD gaming monitor with unique features can now find the [Samsung Odyssey G70B gaming monitor](https://www.amazon.com/SAMSUNG-FreeSync-Compatible-Ultrawide-LS28BG702ENXGO/dp/B0BGVYQ8CC?tag=gamerant0f-20&ascsubtag=UUgrUeUpU2163560&asc_refurl=https%3A%2F%2Fgamerant.com%2Fsamsung-28-inch-4k-gaming-monitor-is-now-150-off%2F&asc_campaign=Affiliate) on Amazon at just $549.99. Key Features - 4K UHD resolution for amazing visual detail - High refresh rate and low response time for great gaming performance. - Integrated cloud gaming with easy access to large libraries of games
